channel.title: Custom quest - u know u wanna click! temptation has took over!
channel.description:
Ok, basically i need a quest where you have a npc, when you click on the npc, he says a message like it does when you start quests on runescape, with the lil chat box, then i need it to tele you. then i need another npc, that sends you a message, gives you a item, and comes up with the custom quest interface. also if there is a way, can i make it so it comes up in quest list
Thanks guys.
Callum
